item.title: Projects
item.description: Some of the projects I worked on in the past few years: 2025: ros2tree A set of Python cli tools for ROS 2, inspired by the tree command. https://github.com/ishaanbhimwal/ros2tree 2024: 8-bit Binary LED Counter Visualize binary counting using LEDs. https://github.com/ishaanbhimwal/8-bit-Binary-LED-Counter 2023: SG-AI Voice Assistant Python-based voice assistant developed using OpenAI's GPT-3.5 language model. https://github.com/ishaanbhimwal/SG-AI 2022: online-python-compiler Online Python Compiler made using JavaScript. https://github.com/ishaanbhimwal/online-python-compiler 2021: Suraksha-Glove Women Safety Device using Arduino and GSM Module.
